title: Enforce simplification of search/replace
description: Enforces the use of simple search/replace instead of sed.

title: Prohibit useless cat usage
description: Prohibits using cat to read files as input to a program.

title: Prohibit usage of expr
description: Prohibits usages of the antiquated expr utility.

title: Prohibit $ on arithmetic variables
description: Prohibits $ in arithmetic contexts.

title: Prohibit backtick substitution
description: Prohibits backtick command substitutions.

title: Prohibit piping output to echo
description: Prohibits piping command output to echo.

title: Enforce usage of pgrep
description: Enforces usage of pgrep over ps aux with grep.

title: Prohibit usage of ls with grep
description: Prohibits usage of ls with grep.

title: Enforce usage of find over ls
description: Enforces usage of find over ls.

title: Enforce for loops by line
description: Enforces looping over lines rather than words.

title: Prohibit early command substitutions evaluation in find
description: Prohibits any command substitutions from being executed before the find command.

title: Prohibit usage of A && B || C as if-then-else
description: Prohibits usage of A && B || C not to be confused with if-then-else.

title: Prohibit usage of single quotes
description: Prohibits usage of single quotes.

title: Enforce multiplication before division
description: Enforces using a\*c/b rather than a/b\*c.

title: Prohibit usage of tr with words
description: Prohibits usage of tr with words

title: Prevent problematic regular expression in grep
description: Prevents problematic regular expression in grep.

title: Prohibit sudo redirects
description: Prohibits sudo redirects.

title: Enforce escaping sequences in \[..\]
description: Enforces escaping sequences in \[..\].

title: Prevent bad quoting
description: Prevents bad quote nesting.

title: Prevent variable unquoting
description: Prevents variables from being accidentally unquoted from surrounding quotes.

title: Prohibit usage of escape sequences with echo
description: Prohibits usage of backslash with echo.

title: Prevent early expansion of variables with ssh
description: Prevents early expansion of variables with ssh.

title: Enforce use of shebang
description: Enforces the use of the shebang directive.
